author: Luis Cruz
subject: Mamo was in...
body:
1st series episode 13 "Beware the Time Machine!" (Time Machine ni ki o
tsukero!)

Full name of the character was Mamo Kyosuke who turned out to be a
scientist gone mad.  Goes after Lupin because Lupin 13th wiped
out the Mamo clan on 31 March 2874.

Probably the seed that spawned the 1st film.  If you read some of
the 2nd series synopses, you can see a lot of similarities to the
films and specials.

Maybe I should go through and compile a list of them...

---
"I have a To Do pile?!" - Homer Simpson

Luis A. Cruz
cruzl@ccs.neu.edu
